name: jsbsim-js

scripts.build:wasm: source /tmp/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && emcmake cmake -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && emmake make -C build -j4

scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run serve
